code_value: Questions 1~2  Your friend likes reading and she goes to the reading club at weekends. Ask her two questions about the reading club.</br>Questions 3~4  You want to have a haircut at the new hairdresser’s recommended by Linda. Ask her two questions about the new hairdresser’s.
Questions 1~2  Your friend likes reading and she goes to the reading club at weekends. Ask her two questions about the reading club.
Questions 3~4  You want to have a haircut at the new hairdresser’s recommended by Linda. Ask her two questions about the new hairdresser’s.
